response.skills: Web Development, REST APIs, Visual Basic .NET (VB.NET), Quality Assurance, Solution Architecture, Workato, Project Management, Microsoft Power Apps, Microsoft Power Virtual Agents, Microsoft Power Automate, UiPath, RPA, Python (Programming Language), Distributed Computing, Business Analytics, Databases, Data Communication, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Microsoft SQL Server

profile_positions.description:
✅ Took part in the construction of an Artificial Intelligence (AI) project focused on the identification and extraction of information from printed catalogs using tools such as TensorFlow, Python, RPA, REST, and React.
✅ Managed both internal and external projects related to Robotic Process Automation (RPA), leading interdisciplinary teams, delivering technical training and providing constructive feedback and technical guidance to the development team members.
✅ RPA Development: (UiPath, Vb.Net, C#, VBA, Microsoft PowerApps, Power Agents, Power Automate, Workato, REST API, Python, Java, SQL, Tableau, SAP).
✅ Performance in roles such as Quality Control (QA), architecture, process management, and business analysis to identify, design, construct and deploy high-quality automations.
✅ Responsible for creating and maintaining frameworks and libraries for RPA development, as well as overseeing UiPath orchestrator, operations, and team infrastructure.
✅ Leadership in migrating integrations to the backend (using SQL and REST APIs), replacing graphical user interface (GUI) interactions in RPA solutions.
profile_positions.title: Automation Engineer

profile_positions.description:
RPA Developer at Seidor Innovativa for Belcorp
✅ Operations Management: responsible for the operation, monitoring, customer support and continuous improvement of RPA projects deployed in production, decreasing incidence rates from 38% to 10% in under 2 months.
✅ Data Analysis: Standardization, structuring, administration and visualization of the CoE's data (team results, KPIs, operation and support indicators, etc.) through the integration of RPA, SQL Server and Tableau.
✅ RPA Development: participation in the development and continuous improvement of bots with technologies such as UiPath, SQL Server, Oracle and PowerApps.
profile_positions.title: RPA Developer

profile_positions.description:
✅ Process Automation in UiPath: multiple end-to-end developments and continuous improvement, technical debt reduction and reparing of old projects.
✅ Standardization of the CoE's documentation and data through integration with UiPath, SQL, Sharepoint, chatbots, Python, and Powerapps to improve WoW from a Data Analytics POV.
profile_positions.title: RPA Automation Trainee

education.degree_name: Bachiller académico con énfasis en matemáticas

company.name: Belcorp
company.description:
Belcorp has 50 years of experience in direct sales. This corporation is a global leader in beauty and personal care, and markets its products through three comercial brands: L´Bel, Esika and Cyzone. It employs over 7,500 people and has a network of more than 800.000 independents beauty consultants.
 
Belcorp has business operations in 14 countries in the Americas: Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Puerto Rico and United States. Its main production center is located in Colombia and the company’s headquarters are located in Peru.
 
In 2017, Belcorp was placed 7th among multinationals worldwide by the Great Place to Work Institute. In addition, Direct Selling News magazine placed the Corporation among the 20 largest direct selling companies worldwide. 
 
Women and their development are the heart of the corporation’s purpose. Belcorp is committed to their empowerment, partnering with leading international institutions, such as the Global Compact, for their benefit.

location.address: Parque Industrial Canavita Vereda Canavita Km 22. Tocancipà, Cundinamarca
